title: The Circrete Difference
subtitle: Marine clay waste
description1: Conventional cement production is responsible for 84% of CO₂ emissions, primarily due to calcination and heating processes.
subtitle2: Circrete’s innovative approach transforms the process:
description2: Circrete’s innovative approach transforms the process:
description: Circrete reduces CO₂ emissions by up to 70% compared to conventional cement while delivering better performance.
